name: Stickman Dismounting Legend
description:
Perform amazing stunts, crash into walls, break bones, destroy vehicles and have fun!

How To Play:
- Tap and Hold on button Start and "Eject" if you want

FEATURES:
- unique working ragdoll physics system
- crispy sound effects
- many levels
- many vehicles
- many props to customize the level
You need to damage the stickman character to score as many points as possible.
Do not try to act the game in real life.
